EmailTemplate.name: Estimate Object Owner is changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Estimate Owner Change - {!Estimate__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Estimate__c.PSR_Owner__c},
The owner of the Estimate "{!Estimate__c.Name}" has been changed.
New Owner of the Estimate is: "{!Estimate__c.OwnerFullName}".
Thanks,
